title: Going Deep with Marianne Williamson
text:
Greg's guest today is Democratic 2020 candidate for President of the United States, Marianne Williamson. Marianne is the author of 13 inspirational books including four New York Times bestsellers, a lecturer, an activist and a non-denominational faith leader. They discuss her plans for fixing the country's biggest problems and how important it is for people to find common ground. They also talk about the upcoming Democratic debates.

To learn more about Marianne go to:

Twitter: @marwilliamson

Website: https://marianne.com/
description: This week, Greg’s guest is Democratic 2020 candidate for President of the United States, Marianne Williamson.
